20110105030536.000|20110105030537.000|CC1|>> I EXPECT IT WILL.            
20110105030537.000|20110105030539.000|CC1|I THINK THE REPUBLICANS HAVE THE
20110105030539.000|20110105030539.000|CC1|VOTE.                           
20110105030539.000|20110105030540.000|CC1|THAT'S THEIR CAMPAIGN PROMISE.  
20110105030540.000|20110105030542.000|CC1|BUT THE EFFORT WE'RE GOING TO   
20110105030542.000|20110105030545.000|CC1|MAKE IS TO MAKE THIS SPECIFIC TO
20110105030545.000|20110105030546.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE UNDERSTAND THAT THIS
20110105030546.000|20110105030549.000|CC1|IS NOT ABOUT THE RHETORIC OF    
20110105030549.000|20110105030551.000|CC1|OBAMA CARE WHICH THE REPUBLICANS
20110105030551.000|20110105030553.000|CC1|DID A GREAT JOB OF VILIFYING.   
20110105030553.000|20110105030554.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT PRACTICAL BENEFITS   
20110105030554.000|20110105030557.000|CC1|THAT WILL HELP THE MIDDLE CLASS.
20110105030557.000|20110105030601.000|CC1|WE HAVE DONNA WATTS FROM        
20110105030601.000|20110105030602.000|CC1|PLAINFIELD, VERMONT.            
20110105030602.000|20110105030603.000|CC1|HER SON GOT OUT OF HIGH SCHOOL. 
20110105030603.000|20110105030605.000|CC1|GOT A JOB, TEN BUCKS AN HOUR.   
20110105030605.000|20110105030607.000|CC1|BUT DIDN'T HAVE HEALTH CARE AS  
20110105030607.000|20110105030608.000|CC1|MOST ENTRY LEVEL JOBS DON'T.    
20110105030608.000|20110105030609.000|CC1|HE GOT IN A CAR CRASH.          
20110105030609.000|20110105030610.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS OF BILLS.  
20110105030610.000|20110105030612.000|CC1|THAT WHOLE FAMILY IS TRYING TO  
20110105030612.000|20110105030613.000|CC1|FIGURE OUT HOW TO PAY THEM.     
20110105030613.000|20110105030616.000|CC1|UNDER THE HEALTH CARE BILL,     
20110105030616.000|20110105030617.000|CC1|DONNA'S SON WOULD CONTINUE TO   
20110105030617.000|20110105030619.000|CC1|HAVE HEALTH CARE ON HER POLICY. 
20110105030619.000|20110105030622.000|CC1|AND THE REPEAL WILL TAKE THAT   
20110105030622.000|20110105030622.000|CC1|AWAY.                           
20110105030622.000|20110105030623.000|CC1|OR LET'S SAY YOUR HUSBAND OR    
20110105030623.000|20110105030626.000|CC1|WIFE HAS CANCER, PRE-EXISTING   
20110105030626.000|20110105030626.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110105030626.000|20110105030628.000|CC1|UNDER THE HEALTH CARE BILL, THEY
20110105030628.000|20110105030630.000|CC1|HAVE A RIGHT TO BUY HEALTH      
20110105030630.000|20110105030631.000|CC1|INSURANCE.                      
20110105030631.000|20110105030633.000|CC1|UNDER THE REPEAL, THEY LOSE THAT
20110105030633.000|20110105030633.000|CC1|BENEFIT.                        
20110105030633.000|20110105030634.000|CC1|YOUR MOM AND DAD ARE SENIORS AND
20110105030634.000|20110105030636.000|CC1|THEY'RE TAKING CARE OF

20110105030639.000|20110105030641.000|CC1|UNDER THE OBAMA HEALTH CARE     
20110105030641.000|20110105030641.000|CC1|LEGISLATION.                    
20110105030641.000|20110105030643.000|CC1|THE REPEAL'S GOING TO TAKE THAT 
20110105030643.000|20110105030644.000|CC1|AWAY.                           
20110105030644.000|20110105030646.000|CC1|SO THE QUESTION THAT WE'RE GOING
20110105030646.000|20110105030648.000|CC1|TO ASK IS ARE THEY WILLING TO   
20110105030648.000|20110105030649.000|CC1|TAKE AWAY THAT HEALTH CARE FROM 
20110105030649.000|20110105030651.000|CC1|DONNA WATTS' SON, ARE THEY      
20110105030651.000|20110105030653.000|CC1|WILLING TO TAKE IT AWAY FROM OUR
20110105030653.000|20110105030654.000|CC1|FATHERS AND MOTHERS WHO ARE     
20110105030654.000|20110105030657.000|CC1|GOING TO GET FREE PREVENTIVE    
20110105030657.000|20110105030658.000|CC1|CARE, ARE THEY GOING TO DENY    
20110105030658.000|20110105030701.000|CC1|COVERAGE TO FOLKS THAT HAVE     
20110105030701.000|20110105030702.000|CC1|CANCER OR ANOTHER PRE-EXISTING  
20110105030702.000|20110105030703.000|CC1|CONDITION?                      
20110105030703.000|20110105030705.000|CC1|WHEN YOU GET SPECIFIC, THE      
20110105030705.000|20110105030706.000|CC1|AMERICAN PEOPLE SUPPORT THOSE   
20110105030706.000|20110105030708.000|CC1|SPECIFIC PROVISIONS.            
20110105030708.000|20110105030711.000|CC1|THIS IS ABOUT REAL WORLD        
20110105030711.000|20110105030712.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCES TO REAL FAMILIES.  
20110105030712.000|20110105030713.000|CC1|IT'S NOT ABOUT THE CAMPAIGN AND 
20110105030713.000|20110105030717.000|CC1|THE POLITICAL RHETORIC ANY MORE.
20110105030717.000|20110105030720.000|CC1|>> MARK MEKHER OF THE TEA PARTY 
20110105030720.000|20110105030720.000|CC1|PATRIOTS.                       
20110105030720.000|20110105030722.000|CC1|THIS VOTE IS FOR YOU.           
20110105030722.000|20110105030723.000|CC1|JANUARY 12th SCHEDULING THIS

20110105033626.000|20110105033628.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS TAKE CONTROL OF THE 
20110105033628.000|20110105033628.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105033628.000|20110105033631.000|CC1|ON THURSDAY, NINE-TERM VIRGINIA 
20110105033631.000|20110105033633.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN BOB GOODLATTE WILL  
20110105033633.000|20110105033635.000|CC1|STEP ON TO THE FLOOR OF THE     
20110105033635.000|20110105033637.000|CC1|HOUSE AND BEGIN TO READ THE     
20110105033637.000|20110105033639.000|CC1|ENTIRE CONSTITUTION ALOUD.      
20110105033639.000|20110105033640.000|CC1|WORD FOR WORD.                  
20110105033640.000|20110105033641.000|CC1|ANY MEMBER OF THE HOUSE,        
20110105033641.000|20110105033642.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT OR REPUBLICAN, WHO     
20110105033642.000|20110105033645.000|CC1|WANTS TO HELP CONGRESSMAN       
20110105033645.000|20110105033648.000|CC1|GOODLATTE CAN COME TO THE FLOOR 
20110105033648.000|20110105033649.000|CC1|ON A FIRST COME, FIRST SERVE    
20110105033649.000|20110105033651.000|CC1|BASIS AND READ A PORTION OF THE 
20110105033651.000|20110105033651.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION.                   
20110105033651.000|20110105033653.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN GOODLATTE SAYS,     
20110105033653.000|20110105033654.000|CC1|QUOTE, THE CONSTITUTION HAS     
20110105033654.000|20110105033655.000|CC1|NEVER BEEN READ ALOUD ON THE    
20110105033655.000|20110105033657.000|CC1|FLOOR OF THE HOUSE OF           
20110105033657.000|20110105033657.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES.                
20110105033657.000|20110105033659.000|CC1|THIS HISTORIC AND SYMBOL YOU CAN
20110105033659.000|20110105033701.000|CC1|READ CAN IS LONG OVERDUE AND    
20110105033701.000|20110105033702.000|CC1|SHOWS THAT THE NEW MAJORITY IN  
20110105033702.000|20110105033704.000|CC1|THE HOUSE TRULY IS DEDICATED THE
20110105033704.000|20110105033705.000|CC1|OUR CONSTITUTION AND THE        
20110105033705.000|20110105033711.000|CC1|PRINCIPLES FOR WHICH IT STANDS. 
20110105033711.000|20110105033712.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN BOB GOODLATTE JOINS 
20110105033712.000|20110105033714.000|CC1|ME NOW FROM CAPITOL HILL.       
20110105033714.000|20110105033715.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN, THANK YOU FOR      
20110105033715.000|20110105033716.000|CC1|JOINING ME TONIGHT.             
20110105033716.000|20110105033717.000|CC1|>> GLAD TO BE WITH YOU,         
20110105033717.000|20110105033718.000|CC1|LAWRENCE.                       
20110105033718.000|20110105033721.000|CC1|>> DO YOU AGREE WITH EVERYTHING 
20110105033721.000|20110105033722.000|CC1|THE FOUNDING FATHERS WROTE IN   
20110105033722.000|20110105033723.000|CC1|THE CONSTITUTION?               
20110105033723.000|20110105033723.000|CC1|>> OH, NO.                      
20110105033723.000|20110105033725.000|CC1|WE CERTAINLY HAVE MADE CHANGES  
20110105033725.000|20110105033726.000|CC1|TO THE CONSTITUTION, AMENDMENTS 
20110105033726.000|20110105033732.000|CC1|TO THE CONSTITUTION, THAT HAVE  
20110105033732.000|20110105033733.000|CC1|CHANGED THE ORIGINAL WRITINGS OF
20110105033733.000|20110105033735.000|CC1|THE CONSTITUTION IN A NUMBER OF 
20110105033735.000|20110105033735.000|CC1|RESPECTS.                       
20110105033735.000|20110105033736.000|CC1|WHEN WE READ THE CONSTITUTION,  
20110105033736.000|20110105033739.000|CC1|WE WILL OMIT THOSE PORTIONS THAT
20110105033739.000|20110105033741.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN DELETED BY SUBSEQUENT 
20110105033741.000|20110105033742.000|CC1|AMENDMENTS THAT WERE ADOPTED    
20110105033742.000|20110105033743.000|CC1|OVER TIME.                      
20110105033743.000|20110105033747.000|CC1|>> BUT YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO READ
20110105033747.000|20110105033749.000|CC1|THE NOTHING THAT THE FRAMERS    
20110105033749.000|20110105033752.000|CC1|SAID ABOUT SLAVERY, FOR EXAMPLE.
20110105033752.000|20110105033754.000|CC1|SLAVERY WAS COMPLETELY          
20110105033754.000|20110105033757.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONAL UNTIL 1875 WHEN  
20110105033757.000|20110105033759.000|CC1|AN AMENDMENT WAS REQUIRE TO     
20110105033759.000|20110105033800.000|CC1|REVISIT THE WISDOM OF THE       
20110105033800.000|20110105033801.000|CC1|FOUNDING FATHERS, WHICH YOU WILL
20110105033801.000|20110105033805.000|CC1|AGREE, SURELY, WAS COMPLETELY   
20110105033805.000|20110105033806.000|CC1|WRONG ON SLAVERY.               
20110105033806.000|20110105033807.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY RIGHT.            
20110105033807.000|20110105033809.000|CC1|AND WE WILL READ THAT 13th      
20110105033809.000|20110105033811.000|CC1|AMENDMENT TO THE CONSTITUTION AS
20110105033811.000|20110105033813.000|CC1|A PART OF THE CONSTITUTION ON   
20110105033813.000|20110105033815.000|CC1|THURSDAY BECAUSE THAT IS INDEED 
20110105033815.000|20110105033817.000|CC1|AN IMPORTANT AMENDMENT THAT     
20110105033817.000|20110105033818.000|CC1|ABOLISHED SLAVERY.              
20110105033818.000|20110105033819.000|CC1|>> SO WE'VE ESTABLISHED THAT    
20110105033819.000|20110105033821.000|CC1|THIS WAS A DOCUMENT WRITTEN BY  
20110105033821.000|20110105033823.000|CC1|MEN, FALLIBLE MEN, WHO MADE SOME
20110105033823.000|20110105033825.000|CC1|GRIEVOUS, IN THE CASE OF        
20110105033825.000|20110105033828.000|CC1|SLAVERY, GRIEVOUS MISTAKES.     
20110105033828.000|20110105033830.000|CC1|WHY IS IT THAT YOU THINK WE NEED
20110105033830.000|20110105033834.000|CC1|TO SOMEHOW RETURN TO WHAT?      
20110105033834.000|20110105033838.000|CC1|A LITERAL INTERPRETATION OF THE 
20110105033838.000|20110105033841.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION OR SOME FLEXIBLE   
20110105033841.000|20110105033844.000|CC1|INTERPRETATION OR FLEXIBLE      
20110105033844.000|20110105033845.000|CC1|INTERPRETATION THAT IS SOMETHING
20110105033845.000|20110105033847.000|CC1|THAT CAN BE DETERMINED ONLY BY  
20110105033847.000|20110105033847.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS?                    
20110105033847.000|20110105033850.000|CC1|>> NO, I THINK THAT WHAT WE     
20110105033850.000|20110105033851.000|CC1|SHOULD RETURN TO IS A DEBATE IN 
20110105033851.000|20110105033853.000|CC1|THE CONGRESS THAT LOOKS AT THE  
20110105033853.000|20110105033854.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION AND LOOKS FOR A    
20110105033854.000|20110105033856.000|CC1|FOUNDATION FOR ANY LAWS THAT THE
20110105033856.000|20110105033857.000|CC1|CONGRESS ADOPTS.                
20110105033857.000|20110105033859.000|CC1|WE ARE A NATION OF LAWS, NOT OF 
20110105033859.000|20110105033900.000|CC1|MEN.                            
20110105033900.000|20110105033901.000|CC1|AND THE CONSTITUTION IS THE     
20110105033901.000|20110105033903.000|CC1|FOUNDATION FOR THOSE LAWS.      
20110105033903.000|20110105033906.000|CC1|AND SO WE THINK THAT A LOT OF   
20110105033906.000|20110105033908.000|CC1|TIMES TODAY MEMBERS OF CONGRESS 
20110105033908.000|20110105033909.000|CC1|INTRODUCE A BILL BECAUSE THEY   
20110105033909.000|20110105033911.000|CC1|THINK IT'S A GRET THING.        
20110105033911.000|20110105033912.000|CC1|IT MIGHT BE A WONDERFUL THING,  
20110105033912.000|20110105033914.000|CC1|BUT IT MAY NOT AT ALL BE WHAT   
20110105033914.000|20110105033916.000|CC1|WAS INTENDED BY OUR FOUNDING    
20110105033916.000|20110105033917.000|CC1|FATHERS TO BE A PART OF OUR     
20110105033917.000|20110105033919.000|CC1|FEDERAL GOVERNMENT AS OPPOSED TO
20110105033919.000|20110105033921.000|CC1|WHAT OUR STATES DO OR WHAT WE AS
20110105033921.000|20110105033923.000|CC1|INDIVIDUALS DO IN A FREE        
20110105033923.000|20110105033923.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110105033923.000|20110105033925.000|CC1|SO THAT'S THE ISSUE THAT HAS    
20110105033925.000|20110105033928.000|CC1|REALLY COME TO A FORE IN THE    
20110105033928.000|20110105033929.000|CC1|LAST SEVERAL MONTHS.            
20110105033929.000|20110105033931.000|CC1|THE HEALTH CARE LEGISLATION HAS 
20110105033931.000|20110105033932.000|CC1|BEEN PARTICULARLY FOCUSED ON    
20110105033932.000|20110105033934.000|CC1|THIS WITH THE ISSUE OF WHETHER  
20110105033934.000|20110105033935.000|CC1|OR NOT IT'S CONSTITUTIONAL FOR  
20110105033935.000|20110105033936.000|CC1|THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT TO       
20110105033936.000|20110105033939.000|CC1|MANDATE THAT INDIVIDUALS BUY    
20110105033939.000|20110105033940.000|CC1|HEALTH INSURANCE FROM PRIVATE   
20110105033940.000|20110105033942.000|CC1|HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANIES.

20110105034300.000|20110105034302.000|CC1|>> BEFORE WE GO, THE MINIMUM

20110105034315.000|20110105034317.000|CC1|>> I HAVE NOT LOOKED AT THE     
20110105034317.000|20110105034318.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONALITY OF THAT ISSUE.
20110105034318.000|20110105034320.000|CC1|IT CERTAINLY IS GOOD WHEN WE    
20110105034320.000|20110105034322.000|CC1|TAKE UP FUTURE DEBATES ABOUT

20110105034324.000|20110105034325.000|CC1|WHETHER OR NOT INDEED THE       
20110105034325.000|20110105034326.000|CC1|CONGRESS HAS THE AUTHORITY TO   
20110105034326.000|20110105034328.000|CC1|IMPOSE A MINIMUM WAGE OR WHETHER
20110105034328.000|20110105034330.000|CC1|THAT SHOULD BE LEFT TO THE      
20110105034330.000|20110105034330.000|CC1|STATES.                         
20110105034330.000|20110105034332.000|CC1|MANY STATES HAVE MINIMUM WAGES  
20110105034332.000|20110105034334.000|CC1|THAT THEY IMPOSE THAT ARE HIGHER
20110105034334.000|20110105034335.000|CC1|THAN THE FEDERAL MINIMUM WAGE.  
20110105034335.000|20110105034336.000|CC1|THAT'S THEIR RIGHT TO DO THAT.  
20110105034336.000|20110105034338.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSMAN, THEN WHY DID YOU

20110105034339.000|20110105034342.000|CC1|MINIMUM WAGE IN THE 110th       
20110105034342.000|20110105034342.000|CC1|CONGRESS?                       
20110105034342.000|20110105034343.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK --             
20110105034343.000|20110105034346.000|CC1|>> YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW IF IT'S  
20110105034346.000|20110105034346.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONAL.                 
20110105034346.000|20110105034347.000|CC1|>> THAT'S CORRECT.              
20110105034347.000|20110105034348.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY IT'S GOOD TO HAVE A  
20110105034348.000|20110105034348.000|CC1|CLEAR DEBATE.                   
20110105034348.000|20110105034350.000|CC1|>> SO YOU VOTED FOR AN INCREASE 
20110105034350.000|20110105034351.000|CC1|IN SOMETHING THAT YOU DON'T EVEN
20110105034351.000|20110105034353.000|CC1|KNOW HAS CONSTITUTIONAL         
20110105034353.000|20110105034354.000|CC1|AUTHORITY TO EXIST?             
20110105034354.000|20110105034355.000|CC1|>> THAT'S CORRECT.              
20110105034355.000|20110105034358.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHY IT'S GOOD TO     
20110105034358.000|20110105034400.000|CC1|REINSTATE THIS FOCUS ON THE     
20110105034400.000|20110105034401.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION AS WE DEBATE THESE

20110105035045.000|20110105035049.000|CC1|FIRST AMENDMENT TO REWRITE AND

20110105035053.000|20110105035055.000|CC1|ACTION ON TELEVISION.

20110105035118.000|20110105035119.000|CC1|COUNCIL ISSUED A STATEMENT WHICH

20110105035122.000|20110105035126.000|CC1|DEVOID OF COMMON SENSE AS IT WAS

20110105035608.000|20110105035610.000|CC1|THE "USS ENTERPRISE" AFTER      
20110105035610.000|20110105035611.000|CC1|CONTROVERSIAL VIDEOS HE PRODUCED
20110105035611.000|20110105035614.000|CC1|AND STARRED IN WERE LEAKED TO   
20110105035614.000|20110105035615.000|CC1|THE VIRGINIA PILOT NEWSPAPER.   
20110105035615.000|20110105035618.000|CC1|THE VIDEOS WERE BROADCAST TO THE
20110105035618.000|20110105035620.000|CC1|SHIP'S 6,000 SAILORS AND MARINES
